text: Lee Young-jun (born 3 January 1991) is a South Korean ice hockey centre. Lee is currently a free agent having last played for the Daemyung Killer Whales of Asia League Ice Hockey (ALIH). He also played for Anyang Halla, High1 and Daemyung Sangmu. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics for the South Korea national team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Anyang Halla players Category:Daemyung Killer Whales players Category:High1 players Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:South Korean ice hockey centres Category:Olympic ice hockey players of South Korea Category:Competitors at the 2011 Winter Universiade
title: Lee Young-jun
